CHAT.comment: Freeplay. Mother and Child sit on the family room floor playing with a box of experimenter provided toys. Mother gets a brief phone call in the middle of the session. Mother's utterances during the call are not transcribed. Child speaks mostly in one-word utterances which are usually intelligible.

u.a: tries to open container with her mouth .
opens box of giant Lego blocks .
starts putting pieces back on clock .
puts chalk on top of plastic container .
tries to look on back of board .
points to printed letters on top of chalkboard .
turns attention back to box of toys .
tells Child how to open container .
reaches to box to open it .
takes plastic magnetic piece out of box .
